What Wallet to use?

We recommend the following wallets:TrustWallet, CipherBrowser, Toshi.

All of these apps are like a combination of Chrome and Metamask on a mobile device.

Install and Use The TrustWallet Go to the TrustWalletApp.com to get TrustWallet Install and Use The CipherBrowser Go to the CipherBrowser.com to get CipherBrowser Install and Use The Toshi Go to the Toshi.org to get Toshi

Why it is a fair game?

Ethereum is a decentralized platform that runs smart contracts: applications that run exactly as programmed without any possibility of downtime, censorship, fraud or third-party interference.
